titles.title: National Grandparent Resource Center Act of 1993
A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to establish the National Resource Center for Grandparents.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3275-3276)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Aging (Labor and Human Resources).

bill.summary: 3/19/1993--Introduced. National Grandparent Resource Center Act of 1993 - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to direct the Commissioner of the Administration on Aging to make grants or enter into contracts for the establishment of the National Resource Center for Grandparents.
